name: 積體電路與靜電放電防護設計實務
goals: Improving the understanding of students on IC and ESD protection design.
Developing the ability of students to implement IC and ESD protection design.
Encouraging the students to have the ability of designing advanced IC to meet the needs of IC design houses.
Cultivating the interest of students, and encouraging for life-long learning.
syllabus:
【Teaching Method: 16+2 Weeks】

【16 Weeks of Teaching】  
Week 1: Introduction  
Week 2: Industrial standards  
Week 3: Basic protection concept  
Week 4: Testing on IC products  
Week 5: 1st case study and practice (1/3)  
Week 6: 1st case study and practice (2/3)  
Week 7: 1st case study and practice (3/3)  
Week 8: Midterm exam  
Week 9: 2nd case study and practice (1/3)  
Week 10: 2nd case study and practice (2/3)  
Week 11: 2nd case study and practice (3/3)  
Week 12: 3rd case study and practice (1/4)  
Week 13: 3rd case study and practice (2/4)  
Week 14: 3rd case study and practice (3/4)  
Week 15: 3rd case study and practice (4/4)  
Week 16: Final exam  
(The arrangement may be adjusted according to the actual situation.)

【2 Weeks of Flexible Teaching】  
Including digital learning, independent learning, remedial teaching, etc.

methodologies.note: Teaching the basic design of integrated circuits and ESD protection circuits.
Some questions will be asked and discussed during the course.
Training the students to solve the ESD problem in integrated circuits.
Training the students to design the integrated circuits and ESD protection circuits to improve their practical skills.

grading.note: Testing of first half of semester.
Testing of second half of semester.

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
